title: Lose so much Lp  and don't gain enough lp!
body: During ranked games I lose around 23-20lp and only gain 18-15lp per game. This is really annoying. G2 currently 31 lp.

replies.body:
*Lew* is spot on with their assessment here. If your MMR is below others in your division, you'll be losing more League Points than you gain until your raise your MMR up. Winning streaks are a good way to raise your MMR. 

Check out our [Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ) for more details, let me know if you have any further questions.

If you lost more [LP ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h2q4)then you gain that means your MMR is really low and you need to win more games to raise it back up.
